title: Mosaic Notebook Settings
description: Controls global stylistic features of the mosaic notebook.

skeuomorphic.title: Skeuomorphic Style (Floating Cell Bubbles)
skeuomorphic.description: Stylize cells as seperate, floating, and round, rather than the default flat, seamless view.

topCellHandle.title: Cell Handle Placement
topCellHandle.description: Put cell handles above code areas rather than beside it
